name: Azure Service Bus
description: This connector enables integration with Azure Service Bus, allowing you to configure multiple connections for sending and receiving messages via queues and topics.

descriptions.value: This connector enables integration with Azure Service Bus, allowing you to configure multiple connections for sending and receiving messages via queues and topics.
Dieser Konnektor ermöglicht die Anbindung an den Azure Service Bus und die Konfiguration mehrerer Verbindungen zum Senden und Empfangen von Nachrichten über Queues und Topics.
